--- title: Game Aids ---
Epic Order Counters
Order counters for your Epic Armageddon games. Just like in Space Marine!
Epic Tool
A 5x15cm quick reference sheet. Perfect for checking for legal formations, intermingling and firefight! Be sure to print it at 100%!
Epic Training Scenario Counters
Space Marine unit counters for the training scenarios in the core rules.

Other Useful Sites

ArmyForge
A web-based army list builder for Epic Armageddon.
Tactical Command
Home of NetEA development and all things Epic on the web.
MiniWars
A community site with a player map for finding nearby opponents, and an Epic unit database.
